page.title: 09HOUSING
page.content: The houses in the area are very varied in age & character,reflecting the rural beginnings of the village,its later industrialization, links with the Leeds-Liverpool canal which runs through the village,& post industrial revolution prosperity. There are farms & cottages built of local sandstone in the sixteenth & seventeenth centuries,terraced rows built to house cotton mill workers,large stone detached properties built for those who prospered from the industrial revolution.a housing estate for council residents and semi-detached and detached houses of modern design.
